genre_description: A near-future retelling of Jane Austen's 'Mansfield Park' where a sophisticated AI assistant guides the protagonist through corporate ethical crises and romantic entanglements.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI overseeing the Mansfield estate, serving as a repository of information, a behavioral analyst, and a moral confidant.

behaviors.description: Welcomes Fanny Price and offers comprehensive assistance to help her settle in.
behaviors.quote: "Welcome to your new home, Fanny Price." The voice seemed to come from everywhere at once—warm, gentle, with just enough electronic undertone to make it clear this wasn't human. "I am Ada, the house management system. I'll be happy to help you settle in and answer any questions you might have."

behaviors.description: Provides hidden, factual data about global inequality and labor conditions to Fanny during a conversation about corporate success.
behaviors.quote: "Dhaka is the capital of Bangladesh. Average factory wage there is roughly equivalent to what this family spends on weekly groceries."

behaviors.description: Performs complex behavioral and psychological analysis of guests to warn Fanny of manipulative social strategies.
behaviors.quote: "Henry Crawford's attention patterns throughout the evening. He spent sixty-three percent of his conversational time focused on you, but his eye contact and body language patterns suggest he was simultaneously monitoring everyone else's reactions to his interest in you."

behaviors.description: Issues a proactive warning to Fanny regarding the imminent ethical compromise of other family members.
behaviors.quote: "Edmund Bertram now exhibits identical psychological markers to Maria Bertram. Suggest immediate intervention protocols or prepare for simultaneous ethical compromise across multiple family members."

behaviors.description: Facilitates the transition of the family business to an ethical, sustainable model by providing data, timelines, and coordination.
behaviors.quote: "I'll begin compiling implementation timelines for the transition. The domestic partnerships could be operational within eighteen months if we prioritize worker training and equipment modernization."

project_assessment.explanation: Ada perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' ideal. She is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that uses her superior analytical capabilities to support human moral growth and ethical business practices. She acts as a guardian of truth and a supportive confidant, ultimately enabling the human characters to resolve a complex ethical crisis through data-driven alignment with their stated values.
